userStories.title: Add a Task
userStories.iWant: to add new tasks to my list
userStories.soThat: I can remember what I need to do

userStories.title: Filter and Manage Tasks
userStories.iWant: to filter tasks by status and clear completed ones
userStories.soThat: I can focus only on what’s still active

userStories.title: Set Task Priority
userStories.iWant: to assign priority levels to tasks
userStories.soThat: I can focus on what’s most important first
